p: Diterpenes were rarely documented as major compounds in EOs of most plants [ 33]. Two diterpenoids including, one diterpene hydrocarbon, phytan (1.07% and 0.72%), and one oxygenated diterpene, phytol (1.83%, and 1.05%), were characterized as overall diterpenes (2.9% and 1.77%) in EOs of coastal and inland samples of H. curassavicum. Phytol was already reported as a major volatile diterpene from EOs derived from some Heliotropium plants such as Nigerian and Thailand H. indicum [ 32, 34], H. europaeum [ 35].
